title: 1 GB per month
info: 1 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 110 Afghanis. Send 110 to activate and to deactivate PU 100 to 3378

title: 2.5 GB monthly
info: 2.5 GB of Internet for 30 days at the price of 250 Afghanis. Send 2GB to 3378 to activate and PU 2GB to deactivate

title: 6+6GB monthly
info: 6GB with 6GB additional internet for 30 days at the price of 499 afghanis. Additional internet can only be used for YouTube from 11:00 PM to 7:00 AM. To activate 4GB and to deactivate PU 4GB, send to 3378

title: 9+9 GB per month
info: 9 GB with 9 GB additional internet for 30 days at the price of 599 Afghanis. Additional internet can only be used for YouTube from 11 pm to 7 am. To activate 599 and to deactivate PU, dial 599 to 3378  Post

title: 13+13GB monthly
info: 13 GB with additional 13 GB of internet for 30 days at the price of 799 afghanis. Additional internet can only be used for YouTube from 11 pm to 7 am. To activate 7GB and to deactivate PU 7GB to 3378

title: 20+20 GB monthly
info: 20 GB with 20 GB additional internet for 30 days at the price of 999 Afghani. Additional internet can only be used for YouTube from 11 pm to 7 am. To activate 10GB and to deactivate PU 10GB to 3378

title: 30+30 GB per month
info: 30 GB with 30 GB additional internet for 30 days at the price of 1,399 Afghanis. Additional internet can only be used for YouTube from 11:00 PM to 7:00 AM. To activate 1399 and to deactivate PU 1399 to 3378

title: 20 GB 3 months
info: 20 GB of Internet for 90 days at the price of 1999 Afghanis. To activate 25GB and to deactivate send PU25GB to 3378
